sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Users, Settings, BarChart3, LogOut, Search, Menu, UserCheck, ShoppingCart, TrendingUp, Activity } from 'lucide-react'; export default function Admin() { const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('dashboard'); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalUsers: 1250, activeUsers: 892, totalOrders: 3456, revenue: 125000 }); useEffect(() => { // Simulated API call for stats remains unchanged }, []); const handleLogout = async () => { try { const confirmed = window.confirm('Are you sure you want to logout?'); if (!confirmed) return; const response = await fetch('/api/auth/logout', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, credentials: 'include' }); if (response.ok) { localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('user'); sessionStorage.clear(); window.location.href = '/login'; } else { console.error('Logout failed, but redirecting anyway'); window.location.href = '/login'; } } catch (error) { console.error('Logout error:', error); window.location.href = '/login'; } }; const StatCard = ({ title, value, icon: Icon, bgColor, iconColor }) => (

{title}

{value.toLocaleString()}

); const DashboardContent = () => (

Recent Activities

New user registered

2 minutes ago

Order #1234 completed

15 minutes ago

User profile updated

1 hour ago

System Status

Database
Online
API Server
Running
Ballerina Backend
Healthy
); const UsersContent = () => { const users = [ { name: 'Kasun Perera', email: 'kasun@gmail.com', status: 'Active', joined: '2024-01-15' }, { name: 'Nimal Silva', email: 'nimal@gmail.com', status: 'Active', joined: '2024-02-20' }, { name: 'Sunil Fernando', email: 'sunil@gmail.com', status: 'Inactive', joined: '2024-03-10' }, ]; const filteredUsers = users.filter(user => user.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || user.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ); return (

User Management

{filteredUsers.length > 0 ? ( filteredUsers.map((user, index) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Name Email Status Joined
{user.name} {user.email} {user.status} {user.joined}
No users found
); }; const OrdersContent = () => (

Recent Orders

Kasun Perera kasun@gmail.com

LKR 15,000

Completed

Nimal Silva nimal@gmail.com

LKR 8,500

Processing
); const SettingsContent = () => (

System Settings

Email Notifications

Send notifications to admin email

Auto Backup

Automatically backup data daily

); const renderContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'dashboard': return ; case 'users': return ; case 'orders': return ; case 'settings': return ; default: return ; } }; return (
{/* Sidebar */}

Admin Panel

{/* Mobile sidebar overlay */} {sidebarOpen && (
setSidebarOpen(false)} /> )} {/* Main content */}
{/* Header */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="bg-transparent outline-none flex-1 text-sm font-medium placeholder-gray-500" />
{/* Main content area */}

{activeTab.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + activeTab.slice(1)}

Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your system.

); }
